summary:
HD Retextures of all the weapons in game  
Photo-realistic retex Collection to make Skyrim a more beautiful place.
Working through the textures one folder at a time.
Please check images section :)
descriptionHtml:
Beautiful Skyrim - The Weapons 
HD Retextures of all the weapons in game one folder at a time

[URL=http://beautifulskyrim.blogspot.com]Visit my Beautiful Skyrim blog[/URL]

Please checkout my other mods
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=120]Beautiful Skyrim-HD Clutter and Furniture[/URL]
[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2057]Beautiful Skyrim-HD Armour and Shields[/URL]

Please endorse if you like my textures

Photo-realistic retex Collection to make Skyrim a more beautiful place.
Working through the textures one folder at a time.
Please check images section :)

[IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/9829/beautifulskyrimweapons1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/6742/titlexl.jpg[/IMG]

All rgb textures raised to 2048x2048 from 512x512 
All normal maps raised to 1024x1024 from 256x256

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder
Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

Deadric Release v0.1
All deadric weapons and arrows

Legendary Release v0.3
improvements to Wuuthhrad
Blade of Woe
Mehrunes Dagger

Glass release v0.1
All of the glass weapons with added transparency :) (wip)
[IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/9831/glasssample.jpg[/IMG]

Legendary Release v0.2
The ruefull axe
The Headsman axe (wip)
Sanguine rose fix
[IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/8641/ruefulaxe.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img100.imageshack.us/img100/3157/staffmagnus.jpg[/IMG]

Legendary Release v0.1
Wabbajack
Mace of Molog Bol and Rusty Mace of Molog Bol  (wip)
Skull of corruption
Nettlebane
Keening (wip)
Volundrung
Wuuthrad (wip)
Chillrend
Ebony blade
Dawnbreaker
Sanguine rose
Staff of magnus
author: Masterdaz
